question: The Union Cabinet has approved an MoU with which country for the exchange of knowledge and technology on cyber-security?
explanation:
The Union Cabinet has approved the MoU with Japan for the exchange of knowledge and technology on cyber-security.
The Cabinet also approved a standardized and transparent e-bidding process in natural gas pricing. It also gave nod for the revised cost of a project of the Kolkata metro rail. The Cabinet also gave its approval to a public awareness campaign on Covid-19.
